channel.title: Issues with character rights and welcome screen
channel.description:
can some1 plz answer these questions:
1. When I go to edit the welcome screen on my server, i edit it, save, compile, and go back and it saves, but when i logg into my server the changes didnt happen. any1 know wat to do. (and after i logged in the changes stayed unlike the player rights)
if any1 knows what to do it would be great, thanks.

item.title: Issues with character rights and welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

Java Is My Bitch:

Use javac compiler. It will pickup the error, if you MADE the change, and when you compiled and ran, and nothing happened, It’s probably that.

forgot how to use javac compilier i know you go to cmd and type in javac then what else[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2007, 01:01:58 AM[/size][hr]Nevermind fixed it ty, but still, what about the welcome screen i can’t fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: Issues with character rights and welcome screen

item.title: Issues with character rights and welcome screen

item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Testscape based sources does not use character files, it saves there but it loads from .dat files I believe? (unconfirmed)

item.title: Issues with character rights and welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Use javac compiler. It will pickup the error, if you MADE the change, and when you compiled and ran, and nothing happened, It’s probably that.
